rules_text:
Create a 1/1 red Human Warlock creature token with prowess. [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Equinox {2}{R} [i](If you cast this spell from your hand for its equinox cost, exile it. At your next upkeep, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
